cause.description:
The activities of the Society are dependent on committed volunteers, many of whom are relatives, neighbours, or friends of persons with Alzheimer Disease. Volunteers are essential in two areas of Society work: fundraising activities and helping in programs with caregivers and services for people with the disease.
The Alzheimer Society of Thunder Bay is one of 39 local chapters in Ontario and is a member of the Alzheimer Society of Ontario.
1. Promoting the rights and well-being of the person with Alzheimer Disease and their caregivers
2. Supporting the delivery of programs for individuals affected by the disease
3. Provide funds for research
cause.mission: The Alzheimer Society of Thunder Bay exists to alleviate the personal and social consequences of Alzheimer Disease and related disorders and to promote research
cause.name: Alzheimer Society of Thunder Bay
